alert.note: Alert for Pine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 11:29PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Pine, southwestern Douglas, west central Washburn and northern Burnett Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1129 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Mille Lacs Band Lena Lake Area, or 13 miles east of Hinckley, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Webb Lake Wisconsin, Danbury, Cloverton, Duxbury, Mille Lacs Band Lena Lake Area, Oakland, Cozy Corner, Birch Island Lake, Kingsdale, Markville, Saint Croix State Park, Cloverdale, Riverside, Yellow Lake, and Chengwatana State Forest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
